title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

title: Men's Cotton Casual Shirt
description: Comfortable 100% cotton casual shirt available in multiple colors and sizes. Perfect for everyday wear with a modern fit.

title: Modern Table Lamp
description: Elegant modern table lamp with adjustable brightness and USB charging port. Adds style and functionality to any room.

title: Programming Fundamentals Book
description: Comprehensive guide to programming fundamentals covering multiple languages and best practices. Perfect for beginners and intermediate developers.

title: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Premium non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Extra thick for comfort and stability during all types of exercises.

title: Natural Face Cream
description: Organic face cream with natural ingredients for all skin types. Provides deep hydration and anti-aging benefits.

title: iPhoneX
description: Latest smartphone with 128GB storage, advanced camera system, and all-day battery life. Features the newest processor and 5G connectivity.

title: Women's Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with advanced cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Designed for comfort and performance.

title: Coffee Maker Deluxe
description: Professional-grade coffee maker with programmable settings, thermal carafe, and built-in grinder for the perfect cup every time.

title: ONIKUMA G58 Hot-Swappable 82-Key RGB Wired Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, Black
Leather Bag
description: Genuine leather wallet with RFID blocking technology, multiple card slots, and coin compartment. Handcrafted with attention to detail.

title: Cookbook Collection
description: Complete cookbook collection with over 500 recipes from around the world. Includes step-by-step instructions and beautiful photography.

title: Resistance Bands Set
description: Complete resistance bands set with multiple resistance levels, door anchor, and exercise guide. Perfect for home workouts.

title: Moisturizing Serum
description: Advanced moisturizing serum with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. Reduces fine lines and provides intense hydration for glowing skin.

title: Apple Watch
description: Feature-rich smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitor, GPS, and smartphone connectivity. Water-resistant design.

title: Decorative Vase
description: Elegant ceramic vase with modern design. Perfect for fresh flowers or as a standalone decorative piece for any room.
